title: Mensa TU - Clausthal
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Buffet, Salad bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The canteen of the Technical University of Clausthal offers some labeled vegan choices daily. The normal dishes are changing daily and sometimes there is a vegetarian meal and also a vegan meal or a soup, or you can choose vegan side dishes or from the salad bar. In addition, the staff cooks an extra vegan meal daily; please ask someone at the food counter. You do not have to be a student to eat there. The cafeteria  offers soymilk. Opening hours of the cafeteria while the university is in session: Mon-Thur 7:30am to 5pm; Fri 7:30am to 2pm. In the non-lecture period: Mon-Thur 8am to 2:30pm; Fri 7:30am to 2pm.
